bug.author: fritzo
bug.summary: Errors when combining iarange + discrete enumeration
bug.description: This issue tracks progress of combining enumeration <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pyro-ppl/pyro/issues/742>#742</denchmark-link> and nested <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pyro-ppl/pyro/pull/780>#780</denchmark-link> . Currently gives incorrect results when enumerating any , even in SS-VAE (as discovered by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/rohitsingh0812>@rohitsingh0812</denchmark-link> ).

comments.comment: This was mostly fixed by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pyro-ppl/pyro/pull/828>#828</denchmark-link> . What remains is to fix broadcasting issues due to global variables that appear in s.
